Constants.Name: Administration.EnableMendixSSOUserMigration
Constants.Description:
If enabled (default: false), the migration microflow 'MendixSSO_MigrateUsersToAccount' is executed after start-up. This constant is used and set by Mendix Studio to perform automatic migration when necessary.

Do not enable this constant manually. For projects using Mendix Studio Pro, make sure to read the instructions in the microflow carefully. If migration is required, execute the migration microflow manually.

Constants.Name: CommunityCommons.MergeMultiplePdfs_MaxAtOnce
Constants.Description:
Restricted to 10 files at once for Mendix Cloud v4 compatibility. If you need to merge more than 10 files increase the number here. Setting the value to <=0 means unlimited.

Note: We very strongly recommend to not increase the number for applications running in Mendix Cloud v4.

Constants.Name: DeepLink.EnableLeadingSlash
Constants.Description:
Adds a leading '/' to the continuation parameter value.
MxSSO requires this constant to be set to 'false'.

Constants.Name: DeepLink.IndexPage
Constants.Description:
The index page that a user will be redirected to when the deeplink request handler finishes. This pages should start the client system, which will trigger the user's home microflow, which will execute the pending link that the handler prepared. You can (for example) modify this to have deeplinks use a different styling from the rest of the system by loading a different index page.
Default: index.html

Constants.Name: DeepLink.LoginLocation
Constants.Description:
If login is required, this constant defines where to use can enter his credentials. If empty, the default location in the theme folder is used: login.html

The original deeplink location will be appended to the login location when the login location ends with a '='.

For example, in case of Mendix SSO:
'https://login.mendix.com/oidp/login?ret='

Default: empty

Constants.Name: DeepLink.RequestHandlerName
Constants.Description: E.g RequesthandlerName 'link' will result in https://yourdomain.com/link/

Constants.Name: DeepLink.SSOHandlerLocation
Constants.Description:
When a deeplink configuration allows anonymous users the SSO Handler will be requested before redirecting the user to its destination.
However, the SSO Handler will only be requested when the user session is an anonymous user session.
Useful in situations when SSO handler does not prompt users for authentication, allowing anonymous users.

The orginial deeplink location will be appended to the login location when the login location ends with a '='.

Example, in case of MendixSSO: '/openid/login?continuation='

Constants.Name: Email_Connector.EmailLogRetention
Constants.Description: The amount of days to preserve error messages.

Constants.Name: EmailTemplate.EmailLogRetention
Constants.Description: The amount of days to preserve error messages.

Constants.Name: EmailTemplate.EmailRetention
Constants.Description: The amount of days to preserve emails which were sent.

Constants.Name: EmailTemplate.OAuthCallbackPath
Constants.Description:
Using this path Redirect URI will formed. For eg. if constant value is "callback_et/"  then in case of Microsoft Azure AD the Redirect URI will be https://appRootURL/callback_et/azure.

Make sure value of this constant has just one "/" and it is placed at the end.

Constants.Name: EmailTemplate.OAuthSignInPath
Constants.Description:
This constant should be exposed to client.

Make sure value of this constant has just one "/" and it is placed at the end.

Constants.Name: EmailTemplate.SendingEnabled
Constants.Description:
Sending emails is enabled by default. 
When setting this value to false emails won't be send. This is useful on test environments for example.

Constants.Name: Encryption.EncryptionKey
Constants.Description:
This key will be used to encrypt and decrypt values.
The length of this key must be 32 characters.

Constants.Name: Encryption.EncryptionPrefix
Constants.Description:
Prefix for stored encrypted values.
This value is used to determine whether the value has been already encrypted.
The prefix must be either {AES}, {AES2} or {AES3}.
Encryption is only supported if the prefix is {AES3}.
It is not recommended to change this value.

Constants.Name: Encryption.LegacyEncryptionKey
Constants.Description:
This key will be used to decrypt values that are encrypted with legacy algorithms.
The length of this key must be 16 characters.

Constants.Name: Encryption.LogNode
Constants.Description: Node which appears in log messages for this module.

Constants.Name: ExcelImporter.EnableExternalEntities
Constants.Description: Enables the parsing of external entities from the DTD. This is turned off by default.

Constants.Name: ExcelImporter.ParseEmptyCells
Constants.Description:
Set this constant to True to allow parsing empty cells with microflow when importing Excel files.

If True, "parse with" microflow will be called for empty cells.
If False (default), the microflow will be called only for cells with data.

Constants.Name: MendixSSO.ConsentToDeleteIncompatibleUsers
Constants.Description:
When your application contains SSO user objects based on a previous user entity and no customized user data has to be retained, you can choose to enable automatic deletion of the old user object  and provisioning of the new user object when that user logs in. Setting the default value of this constant to true will enable this.
(Also read MendixSSO documentation, section "Incompatible user data type")

Note: keep in mind that all your defined delete behaviors will trigger as well.

Constants.Name: MendixSSO.EncryptionPrefix
Constants.Description:
Prefix for stored encrypted values.
This value is used to determine whether the value has been already encrypted.

Constants.Name: MendixSSO.EnvironmentPassword
Constants.Description: This is the password which is used to communicate with the Mendix SSO Provider. This password will be set automatically on deployment in the Mendix Cloud.
Constants.DefaultValue: <Password will be generated by the Mendix Cloud>

Constants.Name: MendixSSO.EnvironmentUUID
Constants.Description: This is the environment UUID which is used to communicate with the Mendix SSO Provider to identify this application. This UUID will be set automatically on deployment in the Mendix Cloud.
Constants.DefaultValue: <EnvironmentUUID will be generated by the Mendix Cloud>

Constants.Name: MendixSSO.SSOEnabled
Constants.Description:
Indicates whether MendixSSO will be enabled on startup, allowing app users to login with their Mendix account. The default value of this constant is 'false' for local deployments, as MendixSSO is a cloud product.
The value will be automatically set to 'true' during deployment in the Mendix Cloud. 

When enabled, Single Sign On will be initiated by navigating to "<App URL>/openid/login" or clicking the 'Mendix Account' button on the login page.

Constants.Name: MendixSSO.TokenEncryptionKey
Constants.Description:
This key will be used to encrypt and decrypt tokens.
The length of this key must be exactly 16 characters.

For local deployment change this value to some random 16 character string.
Constants.DefaultValue: <TokenEncryptionKey will be generated by the Mendix Cloud>

ScheduledEvents.Name: DeepLink.CleanUp
ScheduledEvents.Description: This event cleans up pending deeplinks that are older than the start of the previous day, that were never executed. This prevent stale links from piling up in your database.
